results.name: Quicksilver
results.description: Starts in your opening hand.

results.name: Quinjet
results.description: Ongoing: Cards that didn't start in your deck cost 1 less.

results.name: Red Skull
results.description: Ongoing: Enemy cards at this location have +2 Power.

results.name: Rescue
results.description: On Reveal: If you play a card here next turn, +5 Power.

results.name: Rhino
results.description: On Reveal: Ruin this location. (remove its ability)

results.name: Rocket Raccoon
results.description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +2 Power.

results.name: Rockslide
results.description: On Reveal: Shuffle 2 Rocks into your opponent's deck.

results.name: Rogue
results.description: On Reveal: Steal an Ongoing ability from a random enemy card at this location.

results.name: Ronan the Accuser
results.description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponent's hand.

results.name: Sabretooth
results.description: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand. It costs 0.

results.name: Sandman
results.description: Ongoing: Players can only play 1 card a turn.

results.name: Sauron
results.description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your hand and deck.

results.name: Scarlet Witch
results.description: On Reveal: Replace this location with a random new one.

results.name: Scorpion
results.description: On Reveal: Afflict cards in your opponent's hand with -1 Power.

results.name: Sentinel
results.description: On Reveal: Add another Sentinel to your hand.

results.name: Sentry
results.description: You can't play this at the right location. On Reveal: Add a -8 Power Void to the right location.

results.name: Sera
results.description: Ongoing: Cards in your hand cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

results.name: Shadow King
results.description: On Reveal: Set all cards here to their original base Power.

results.name: Shang-Chi
results.description: On Reveal: Destroy all enemy cards at this location that have 9 or more Power.

results.name: Shanna
results.description: On Reveal: Add a random 1-Cost card to each location

results.name: She-Hulk
results.description: Costs 1 less for each unspent Energy last turn.

results.name: Shocker
results.description: I'm gonna blast you!

results.name: Shuri
results.description: On Reveal: Double the Power of the next card you play.

results.name: Silver Surfer
results.description: On Reveal: Give your other 3-Cost cards +2 Power.
